excerpt: Beachfront eatery featuring Pacific Rim cuisine & cocktails, plus striking views during sunset.
detail_description: The Beach House Restaurant in Kauai is a beloved beachfront eatery known for its Pacific Rim cuisine and cocktails, offering breathtaking views especially during sunset. Situated along Lawa Beach in Poipu on the south shore, this restaurant provides a luxurious yet welcoming atmosphere with stunning ocean vistas. Co-owned by Peter Merriman and William Terry, it embodies classic Hawaiian hospitality.
name: Beach House Restaurant - Kauai

excerpt: Innovative small plates such as polenta & scallops steal the show at this urban chic eatery.
detail_description: Bar Acuda is a top pick for the best restaurant in Hanalei, offering an upscale dining experience with a focus on tapas-style small plates. Located in an urban chic setting, this eatery serves innovative dishes such as polenta and scallops that steal the show. The riverside location at Hanalei's eastern end provides a lovely setting for lunch or sunset dinner, featuring fresh fish prepared cooked or as sushi, along with steak options.
name: Bar Acuda

excerpt: Beachfront eatery & bar named for a surfing legend with global cuisine & 2-tiered outdoor seating.
detail_description: Duke's Kauai is a beachfront restaurant and bar located on Kalapaki Beach in Lihue, Hawaii. Named after the surfing legend Duke Kahanamoku, this eatery offers global cuisine and features two-tiered outdoor seating with stunning ocean views. The Barefoot Bar on the main level provides a casual dining experience just steps away from the beach, serving daily specials and popular dishes like Korean steak street tacos and fresh seafood.
name: Duke's Kauai

excerpt: Grand Hyatt destination offers upscale Hawaiian cuisine in open-air thatch huts along a lagoon.
detail_description: Tidepools is a stunning restaurant located at the Grand Hyatt Kauai, offering an upscale Hawaiian dining experience in a unique setting. Modeled after a traditional Hawaiian Village, the restaurant features open-air hale pili (thatched-roof bungalows) where diners can enjoy their meal while feeling the mist from surrounding waterfalls and taking in the beautiful Kauai scenery.
name: Tidepools

excerpt: Sophisticated, multi-level restaurant preparing locally sourced, regional Hawaiian dinners.
detail_description: Merriman's Kauai is a sophisticated, multi-level restaurant in Poipu that offers locally sourced, regional Hawaiian dinners. Owner-Chef Peter Merriman has been a pioneer of sustainable and locally-sourced cuisine since opening the original Waimea location in 1988. The Poipu location continues this tradition with over 90% of its ingredients being locally grown or sustainably caught.
name: Merriman's Kauai
address: 2829 Ala Kalanikaumaka St, Koloa, HI 96756, USA

excerpt: Upscale, modern restaurant in the Koa Kea Hotel serving inventive Hawaiian plates amid ocean views.
detail_description: Red Salt is an upscale and modern restaurant located in the Koa Kea Hotel, offering inventive Hawaiian plates with stunning ocean views. The restaurant's contemporary menu showcases fresh, local flavors and reflects the island life. Executive Chef Noelani Planas, a Kauai native, incorporates regional ingredients into dishes like Braised Mushroom and Spinach Ravioli and a tomato salad with basil oil. Red Salt also offers vegan options such as Roasted Beet Salad and Red Salt Cake.
name: Red Salt

excerpt: Laid-back eatery frequented by locals serves fresh fish, unique rolls & nigiri with riverside seats.
detail_description: The Hanalei Dolphin Restaurant is a laid-back eatery popular among locals, offering fresh fish, unique sushi rolls, and nigiri. Situated close to the beach, it provides a nice setting with riverside seats where diners can enjoy ocean breezes. The restaurant also offers a kids' menu with non-fried items and a grassy area for children to play while adults relax.
name: The Hanalei Dolphin Restaurant
address: 5-5016 Kuhio Hwy C, Hanalei, HI 96714, USA

excerpt: Inventive island flavors, fresh local seafood & a unique wine list along with nightly entertainment.
detail_description: Hukilau Lanai, located inside the Kauai Coast Resort at the Beachboy, offers inventive island flavors and a unique wine list. The restaurant features fresh local seafood and hosts nightly entertainment with top musicians playing Hawaiian, jazz, country, and blues from Tuesday through Sunday. Guests can enjoy a gluten-free prix-fixe 5-course meal that has received rave reviews for its quality and value.
name: Hukilau Lanai

excerpt: Casual cafe has jumbo portions of omelets, sandwiches & Hawaiian dinners from local ingredients.
detail_description: Nestled in the scenic upcountry of Kalaheo, Kalaheo Cafe & Coffee Company is a charming eatery that offers a delightful dining experience. This beloved local gem is renowned for its generous portions of omelets, sandwiches, and Hawaiian dinners made from fresh, local ingredients. Whether you're craving a hearty breakfast or a satisfying lunch or dinner, this cozy spot has something for everyone.
name: Kalaheo Cafe & Coffee Company

excerpt: Acclaimed spot for thoughtfully sourced Hawaiian-inspired cuisine in modern surrounds.
detail_description: Located on the east coast of Kauai, JO2 Natural Cuisine is a charming restaurant that offers a unique blend of Hawaiian, Japanese, and French-inspired dishes. The menu features thoughtfully sourced ingredients and changes daily to showcase the freshest local produce. From prawn & roasted Chinese duck lumpia to seared Hokkaido scallops, the culinary creations at JO2 are both diverse and delightful.
name: JO2 Natural Cuisine

excerpt: Pupu platters, ahi tuna burgers & more seafood at a casual, beachfront space with vista views.
detail_description: Brennecke's Beach Broiler is a casual beachfront restaurant located on the beautiful Poipu Beach, offering stunning ocean views. During Christmas, they offer a special dinner menu featuring dishes like organic Kauai-grown arugula salad and panko-crusted double Colorado lamb chops. The restaurant also serves a variety of signature cocktails, including the popular Brennecke's Mai Tai and Mango Madness.
name: Brennecke's Beach Broiler

excerpt: Family-owned counter-serve providing Hawaiian & American plate lunches to go & party platters.
detail_description: Koloa Fish Market is a family-owned counter-serve eatery that offers both Hawaiian and American plate lunches for takeout as well as party platters. The market is popular among sushi enthusiasts, with daily poke specials featuring fresh ahi mixed with island avocado, soy, wasabi, and green roe. Additionally, the nearby La Spezia restaurant provides an inviting atmosphere with wood floors and black-and-white photos of the owners' relatives.
name: Koloa Fish Market

detail_description: Hanalei Bread Company is a popular breakfast spot in Hanalei, Kauai, known for its delicious coffee, smoothies, and breakfast options. It's highly recommended by travelers and locals alike. The restaurant offers a variety of healthy food options with an incredible view of Hanalei Bay. Nourish Hanalei is another healthy food stand that provides Acai bowls, veggie bowls, and wraps while offering a stunning view of the bay as well.
name: Hanalei Bread Company

excerpt: History-minded Hawaiian spot by Roy Yamaguchi for traditional & modern fare with local sourcing.
detail_description: Eating House 1849 Koloa, a culinary gem by renowned chef Roy Yamaguchi, beautifully marries traditional Hawaiian flavors with modern dining experiences. This charming spot emphasizes local sourcing, ensuring that every dish reflects the rich heritage of the islands. Guests rave about their unforgettable meals, particularly the Goat Cheese Mashed Potatoes and succulent ribeye steak. The cocktail menu is equally impressive, featuring delightful concoctions like the Mango Plantation and Home Grown drinks that perfectly complement your meal.
name: Eating House 1849 Koloa
address: 2829 Ala Kalanikaumaka St A-201, Koloa, HI 96756, USA

detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Hanapepe, Japanese Grandma's Cafe is a beloved spot offering authentic Japanese cuisine and warm hospitality. The menu features a variety of traditional dishes like sushi, ramen, and tempura made with fresh and flavorful ingredients. It's advisable to make reservations in advance due to its popularity, but walk-ins may be accommodated if space is available. The cozy dining area resembles a small garden and occasionally hosts live music performances.
name: Japanese Grandma's Cafe

excerpt: Seafood, salads & breakfast in a simple, laid-back locale with a bar & Hawaiian music nightly.
detail_description: Tahiti Nui is a laid-back restaurant and bar in Hanalei, offering a warm and friendly atmosphere with live Hawaiian music. Since its establishment in 1963, this family-run spot has maintained its casual and romantic vibe. The menu features locally sourced organic salads, signature pizzas, poke bowls, baby back ribs, aged ribeye, fresh island fish, braised pork, and daily pasta specials.
name: Tahiti Nui

detail_description: Lava Lava Beach Club is a beachfront venue located in Kauai, offering a perfect spot to relax and enjoy mixed drinks and late lunches with ocean views. The club provides plenty of outdoor seating for guests to soak up the sunshine from happy hour into the evening. Their menu includes a variety of food options such as fish tacos, poke nachos, pizzas, and vegetarian choices.
name: Lava Lava Beach Club

excerpt: Casual & cozy eatery dishing out substantial island-style breakfasts & American classics.
detail_description: Kountry Kitchen is a beloved dining spot in Kauai, Hawaii, offering a relaxed and inviting atmosphere to savor island-style breakfasts and classic American dishes. The restaurant is renowned for its generous portions and top-notch service. Guests can enjoy an array of delectable options such as plate-sized macadamia nut pancakes with homemade coconut syrup, fresh strawberry French toast, hash browns, cornbread, omelettes, eggs Benedict, and more.
name: Kountry Kitchen

excerpt: Charming, family-friendly restaurant for thoughtfully sourced, island-inspired dishes, plus cocktails, wine & beer.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Poipu Shopping Village, Keoki's Paradise is a delightful family-friendly restaurant that captures the essence of island dining. Surrounded by lush tropical plants, serene fishponds, and charming waterfalls, this eatery offers a picturesque ambiance perfect for any occasion. The menu features thoughtfully sourced dishes inspired by local flavors, including an array of fresh island fish and hearty steak options that cater to both adults and children alike.
name: Keoki's Paradise
address: 2360 Kiahuna Plantation Dr, Koloa, HI 96756, USA

excerpt: Popular food cart serving up sausages, hot dogs & grilled cheese sandwiches heaped with toppings.
detail_description: If you're exploring the stunning landscapes of Kaua’i, make sure to swing by Porky's Kaua’i for a delightful culinary experience. This popular food cart has evolved from a humble hot dog stand into a beloved food truck, serving up mouthwatering pork sandwiches that are simply irresistible.
name: Porky's Kaua’i

excerpt: This colorful counter with outdoor seating dispenses coffee, acai bowls, sandwiches & smoothies.
detail_description: Little Fish Coffee in Poipu is a vibrant and inviting outdoor coffee shop that offers a variety of beverages and food options. The colorful counter and outdoor seating area provide the perfect setting to enjoy their delicious coffee, acai bowls, sandwiches, smoothies, homemade chai, fresh iced tea, flavored Italian sodas, and rich hot chocolate.
name: Little Fish Coffee Poipu

excerpt: Chill spot for speciality Polish sausages with a Hawaiian twist  & homemade shave ice.
detail_description: Puka Dog Hawaiian Style Hot Dogs is a popular spot known for its unique take on hot dogs with a Hawaiian twist. The establishment bakes its own version of classic Hawaiian sweet bread, specially designed to fit a Polish sausage or veggie dog. These hot dogs are then topped with a spicy garlic lemon sauce and tropical fruit relish, creating a flavor combination that sparks debate among food enthusiasts.
name: Puka Dog Hawaiian Style Hot Dogs

excerpt: Easygoing eatery & bar with Hawaiian-inspired cafe fare & frequent live music, plus a gourmet deli.
detail_description: The Hanalei Gourmet is a laid-back restaurant and bar in Hanalei, offering a blend of Hawaiian-inspired cafe dishes and live music. The establishment also features a gourmet deli for those looking to grab some high-quality provisions. It's known for its relaxed atmosphere and frequent live entertainment, making it a great spot to enjoy delicious food while taking in the local music scene.
name: The Hanalei Gourmet
address: 5-5161 Kuhio Hwy space 5, Hanalei, HI 96714, USA

excerpt: Breezy eatery offering bowls, fish tacos & burritos in a pared-back space, plus outdoor dining.
detail_description: Located in Kapaa, Hawaii, Sleeping Giant Grill is a laid-back eatery that offers a variety of dishes such as bowls, fish tacos, and burritos. The restaurant provides a relaxed setting for late lunch or dinner and also features outdoor dining. It's known for its salad with grilled fish, Ahi or chicken burrito, and Ono Fish Tacos.
name: Sleeping Giant Grill

excerpt: Counter-serve coffeehouse serving a variety of light fare in a space adorned with local art.
detail_description: Java Kai is a charming coffeehouse located on the North Shore, offering a delightful selection of coffee and light bites in a space adorned with local art. The cozy ambiance and friendly service make it the perfect spot to ease into your morning. They serve an array of coffee blends sourced from various Hawaiian islands, including Maui, Molokai, Kauai, and the Big Island.
name: Java Kai Kapaa

excerpt: Simple Mexican eatery serving up a casual menu featuring burritos, tacos & sides.
detail_description: Da Crack Mexican Grinds is a laid-back Mexican eatery located in Kukuiula Market in Koloa near Kauai's South Shore. The restaurant offers a casual menu featuring burritos, tacos, and sides. It's part of a vibrant hub of hip businesses that includes Cortado Coffee, Makai Sushi, Anakes Juice Bar, and The Fresh Shave.
name: Da Crack Mexican Grinds

detail_description: Pono Market is a locally owned and operated eatery and convenience store in Kapaa, serving up delicious Hawaiian plate lunches with options like spicy poke, lomilomi salad, and chicken laulau. They also offer a variety of musubi flavors and meats, including teriyaki beef or chicken, as well as classic Spam. The market has been a favorite among locals for over three generations due to its fantastic prices on poke, kim chee, and fresh manju.
name: Pono Market

excerpt: Counter-serve restaurant whipping up Hawaiian fare from plate lunches to bento boxes.
detail_description: Mark's Place is a popular counter-serve restaurant located in Puhi Industrial Park at 1610 Haleukana St., Lihue. The restaurant offers a variety of Hawaiian fare, from plate lunches to bento boxes. It features daily salad and entree specials with a healthy twist, such as shrimp and grilled-vegetable quinoa salad and cornmeal-crusted mahi with chipotle aioli.
name: Mark's Place

excerpt: Casual tavern with a bamboo bar & porch seating offering a Hawaiian-style menu & tropical drinks.
detail_description: Kalypso Island Bar & Grill is a laid-back tavern featuring a charming bamboo bar and outdoor seating, offering a menu inspired by Hawaiian cuisine and tropical drinks. Located in Hanalei, it provides a riverside setting for lunch or sunset dinner with options like fresh fish prepared in various ways and steak. The restaurant is known for its poke with fried calamari lettuce wraps and offers a casual dining experience with an island vibe.
name: Kalypso Island Bar & Grill

excerpt: Sushi house dispensing inventive hand rolls & familiar Japanese mains in a homey, low-key setting.
detail_description: Kintaro Japanese Restaurant is a beloved spot on the East Side of Kauai, known for its serene Asian decor and unobtrusive service. The restaurant offers a variety of Japanese dishes including sushi, sashimi, teppanyaki, tempura, yakitori, and hot pot options. The chefs are highly skilled and use the freshest ingredients to craft incredible fare.
name: Kintaro Japanese Restaurant

detail_description: Holey Grail Donuts is a popular spot with locations in Hanalei, Oahu, and Los Angeles. It all started in 2018 when the founders began serving hand-fried taro doughnuts from a small red burger trailer. The donuts are made with locally sourced ingredients like taro from Kealia Farms and flavored with passion fruit, chocolate, vanilla, strawberry guavas, and dragon fruit.
name: Holey Grail Donuts

excerpt: Steakhouse serving upscale surf 'n' turf in a relaxed, airy setting with ocean views since 1973.
detail_description: The Bull Shed Restaurant, established in 1973, is a popular oceanfront dining spot in Kapaa. It offers a relaxed and casual atmosphere with stunning ocean views, making it an ideal choice for couples seeking a romantic evening. Known for its surf 'n' turf menu featuring generous portions at reasonable prices, the restaurant has become a local favorite.
name: Bull Shed Restaurant

excerpt: Brick-oven pizzeria (part of a longtime local chain) with a broad menu, full bar & TVs.
detail_description: Brick Oven Pizza is a popular pizzeria known for its fragrant, hearth-baked pies and broad menu. It's considered the best pizza spot on the island by both travelers and locals. The family-owned establishment offers crisp crusts, succulent sauces, and authentic toppings including local seafood, real cheeses, fresh vegetables, and homemade sausage. With a full bar and TVs, it's a great place for families to enjoy a variety of pizza options while sipping on drinks.
name: Brick Oven Pizza

excerpt: Open-air, waterside fine-dining destination featuring locally sourced Hawaiian cuisine.
detail_description: Oasis on the Beach is a charming open-air, waterfront restaurant in Kapaa, Hawaii. It offers a fine dining experience with locally sourced Hawaiian cuisine. Situated near The Outrigger Waipouli Beach, this independently owned establishment boasts a tropical and friendly atmosphere. Guests can savor delicious meals made from over 90% locally-sourced ingredients while enjoying mesmerizing Kauai sunsets and ocean views.
name: Oasis on the Beach

excerpt: Laid-back eatery serving a hybrid of local Hawaiian & Texas mesquite-smoked meats, salads & sides.
detail_description: Kiawe Roots is a laid-back restaurant that offers a fusion of local Hawaiian and Texas mesquite-smoked meats, along with salads and sides. Originally starting as a food truck, this locally owned establishment has now expanded into a beloved brick-and-mortar eatery. The name "Kiawe" comes from the Hawaiian word for mesquite, reflecting their specialty in smoked meat dishes infused with island flavors.
name: Kiawe Roots

excerpt: Relaxed local chain serving coffee, homemade ice cream & baked goods featuring macadamia nuts.
detail_description: Lappert's Hawaii is a local chain known for its delicious coffee, homemade ice cream, and baked goods featuring macadamia nuts. The original Hanapepe location is where the magic happens, with small batches of premium ice cream and sorbet in various flavors like chocolate chip cookie dough and green tea. The handmade artisan ice cream, gelato, sorbets, cookies, pastries, and micro-roasted coffees are made fresh daily in small batches at Lappert's.
name: Lappert's Hawaii
address: 2829 Ala Kalanikaumaka St, Poipu, HI 96756, USA

excerpt: Enduring pit stop dishing out Hawaiian shave ice in unique flavors, açai bowls & organic coffee.
detail_description: Wishing Well Shave Ice is a beloved pit stop in Hanalei, Kauai, offering Hawaiian shave ice with unique flavors, açai bowls, and organic coffee. Established in 1983 and now operated by Kauai natives Jesse Merle Jones and Aamion Goodwin, this spot has transitioned to using fresh, organic ingredients while still serving delicious shave ice.
name: Wishing Well Shave Ice

excerpt: Gourmet burger eatery featuring creative patties, craft brews & wines in a sleek, minimalist space.
detail_description: Street Burger Kauai is a gourmet burger eatery known for its creative patties, craft brews, and wines. The restaurant offers a sleek and minimalist space for diners to enjoy their meals. The menu features burgers made with locally sourced grass-fed beef and topped with a variety of delicious ingredients.
name: Street Burger Kauai

excerpt: Warm, wood-clad eatery with a patio offers bowls of ramen noodles & steamed buns plus cocktails.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Hanalei, AMA Restaurant is a cozy wooden-clad eatery known for its delectable bowls of ramen noodles, steamed buns, and refreshing cocktails. The restaurant offers a tropical outdoor setting with a patio where guests can savor Kauai's best ramen and noodles, poke, or ceviche.
name: AMA Restaurant

excerpt: Bustling takeaway option for a variety of poke bowls, fish tacos & seafood plates.
detail_description: If you're in Lihue and craving a quick yet delicious meal, look no further than The Fish Express. Nestled on the Hanamaulu side of town, this charming gray building is conveniently located across from Walmart and just a stone's throw from the airport. Here, you can indulge in an array of mouthwatering poke bowls, fish tacos, and seafood plates that won't break the bank.
name: The Fish Express

detail_description: Waikomo Shave Ice is a popular choice for shave ice on Kauai, known for its high quality and all-natural ingredients. The cart offers a variety of flavors made with natural fruit syrups and topped with locally sourced honey and fresh fruits. Customers can also enjoy their shave ice in a unique coconut cup, adding to the authentic Hawaiian experience. Despite its unassuming location next to a market, this spot is highly recommended by visitors for its flavorful treats.
name: Waikomo Shave Ice

detail_description: Jojo's Shave Ice is a must-visit Hawaiian treat with two locations in Hanalei and Waimea. This popular spot offers an array of 34 unique flavors, including Blue Hawaii and Ha Coffee Bar. Customers can enjoy generous serving sizes with options like the Da Kine (28 oz.) or the Big Kahuna (40 oz.).
name: Jojo's Shave Ice

excerpt: No-frills, counter-serve space for saimin (a classic Hawaiian noodle soup) & lilikoi chiffon pie.
detail_description: Hamura Saimin is a casual, no-frills eatery in Lihue that serves up authentic Hawaiian comfort food. The menu is short and sweet, with a focus on saimin, a local dish blending Japanese ramen, Chinese mein, and Filipino pancit. The restaurant is particularly renowned for its special saimin featuring wontons, roast pork, and an egg.
name: Hamura Saimin

excerpt: House brews & global comfort eats, plus ciders & wines, are presented in simple, relaxed environs.
detail_description: Kauai Beer Company is a casual dining spot that offers a range of house-brewed beers, ciders, and wines alongside global comfort food. The relaxed atmosphere makes it an ideal place to savor culinary delights while enjoying the island breeze on their outdoor patio. Their innovative dishes include a unique take on Brussels sprouts with kung pao sauce, peanuts, fried garlic, and red chili flakes.
name: Kauai Beer Company

excerpt: Unfussy, counter-serve stop for Hawaiian takes on classic noodle dishes with hearty ingredients.
detail_description: Wailua Drive In is a casual eatery known for its Hawaiian twists on classic noodle dishes. Featured on Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives, it's popular among locals and tourists alike. The chili pepper chicken with white rice and macaroni salad is a must-try, as well as the flavorful teriyaki beef. The staff are friendly and attentive, making the dining experience exceptional.
name: Wailua Drive In
address: 4-733 Kuhio Hwy Suite 103, Kapaʻa, HI 96746, USA

excerpt: Coconut shrimp, fish tacos & other familiar seafood plates round out the menu at this casual locale.
detail_description: Coconut's Fish Cafe, located in the Safeway shopping center between Kapa'a and Wailua, is a casual locale offering a variety of familiar seafood dishes. The restaurant prides itself on using family recipes passed down through generations to create authentic Hawaiian flavors. In addition to stellar fish tacos, they also serve kalua pork tacos and great fish and chips for kids. The menu features lots of gluten-free options as well as seared ahi and spicy poke bowl.
name: Coconut's Fish Cafe
address: Safeway/Ross Shopping Center, 4-831, Kuhio Hwy Suite 420-424, Kapaʻa, HI 96746, USA

excerpt: Vegetarian, vegan & gluten free options are available at this funky food truck with a healthy bent.
detail_description: Fresh Bite Farm To Beach is a vibrant food truck located in downtown Hanalei, offering a variety of healthy and delicious options. The menu includes salads, wraps, quinoa bowls, sandwiches, french fry baskets, poi, and treats. The family-owned establishment prides itself on serving farm-to-beach dishes such as the Gaucho Quinoa Bowl and Poi Bowl made from fresh local produce.
name: Fresh Bite Farm To Beach

excerpt: Modest roadside seafood shack offering shrimp-based dishes served on paper plates at picnic tables.
detail_description: The Shrimp Station is a charming seafood shack located near the entrance of Waimea Canyon, known as the Grand Canyon of the Pacific. This modest eatery offers a variety of shrimp-based dishes served on paper plates at outdoor picnic tables. The menu features delectable options such as coconut shrimp and sweet chili garlic shrimp, prepared with care and served in generous portions. Whether you prefer your shrimp peeled or not, The Shrimp Station has something for everyone.
name: The Shrimp Station

excerpt: Spacious, mellow eatery with a full bar & diverse menu, from diner classics to Hawaiian fare.
detail_description: Olympic Cafe is a spacious and relaxed eatery in Kapaa, Kauai, offering a diverse menu that includes diner classics and Hawaiian fare. The cafe has a full bar and serves up a variety of dishes from breakfast to dinner. Guests can enjoy French toast, egg dishes, omelets, fresh seafood, burgers, chicken, kalua pork, and other local favorites. The ambiance is sunny and comfortable with French doors open to the street.
name: Olympic Cafe

excerpt: Open, relaxed bistro with fine American dishes, seafood & cocktails, plus ocean views & artsy decor.
detail_description: Sams Ocean View Restaurant in Kapaa, Kauai is a popular dining spot known for its relaxed bistro atmosphere, delectable American cuisine, and refreshing cocktails. The restaurant offers stunning ocean views and features artsy decor that adds to its charm. Owned by Samantha Reynolds, the restaurant provides an open front layout that seamlessly integrates the outdoor beauty of Kapaa's coast with indoor dining.
name: Sam's Ocean View Restaurant Kapaa Kauai
